name: Fly Paper Shop
para1: An e-commerce shop for all things fly fishing
para2: An online platform for fly fishing. Users can post their catches, discuss various topics in the forum section as well as buy any fly fishing material they need in the e-commerce shop.

name: LedgerBolt
para2: An internal accounting application that will be used to keep track of clients, services and expenses for the automatic creation of invoices. Currently in the API implementation phase

name: Woya
para2: A turn-based game with a platforming boss level. While one of the hardest projects I've ever worked on, this project brought my JS skills to the next level. All game engine components as well as all the art were created from scratch by me by me

name: Portfolio
para2: This portfolio made me truly fall in love with React. The control and power it puts in your hands is unmatched. It has become my go-to frontend framework.

name: RainyCast
alt: A weather app using the MERN stack
para2: A weather app built using the MERN stack. It fetches its data from an external API.

name: PartumMedia
para2: Creating this website taught me many valuable lessons, such as color psychology for call-to-actions, fonts, and backgrounds as well as researching client necessities and providing them with a UI that meets those needs.

name: Cork Blog
para2: This build is 100% custom, created in Wordpress using my own personalized theme. I wanted to dip my toes into PHP, and this was the result. While simple, it taught me much about PHP and Wordpress in general.

name: BonApp
para1: A restaurant review app built in React.
para2: My very first project built in React. It taught me a multitude of things, including how to work with external APIs as well as getting my feet wet with the all powerful React framework.

name: Misc Designs
para2: A collection of miscellaneous designs that I've created for myself as well as real clients.
